body.p:
Toronto, University Library, Thomas Fisher Rare Book Library
MSS 01053. Magna carta with statuta vetera, then updated through 1470. 149 ff. 120 x 80 mm.
Provenance: William, first Baron Paget (d. 1563); Edward Hennell; olim Royal Ontario Museum of Archaeology,
Bibliography: Faye and Bond, p. 534, no. 20; 'Directory’, p. 418.
